name: Galarian Obstagoon
author: Hasuno
flavor_text: It evolved after experiencing numerous fights. While crossing its arms, it lets out a shout that would make any opponent flinch.

abilities.name: Untamed Shout
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may put 3 damage counters on 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon.

attacks.name: Obstruct
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Basic Pokémon.
